Posts.Content: my doctor adviced me to go for mammo as i am having continuous breast pain which someyimes also feels in left armpit. I hope it is benigne but symptoms really scared me i also found watery discharge from both sides and having a constant feeling of some kind of burden inside my chest. Need replies and suggestions. Thanx
Posts.Title: need to know is it dangerous?

Posts.Content: hi there my age is 24 and about 2 or 3 three years back i had tumor in my left breast near to nipple i got it checked but the doctor said it was only a minor infection and gave me antibiotic and the tumor vanished after few days but now for many weeks in fact months i am having pain in my left side specially when i bend down it increased and sometimes i feel like it is moving from breast to armpit.few days ago i had severe pain in my left armpit that i couldn't move my arm for seconds but it did not last for long. i do not feel any lump, but i am scared because my maternal grandmother died of breast cancer and paternal grandmother died of lung cancer. so should i get checked again?
Posts.Title: need to know is it dangerous?
need to know is it dangerous?
